attributes.action: stop any tax on o.a.p winter fuel payments by over paid m.ps.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop mps taxing o.a.p fuel payments that have the massive income of £9000 per year to live on,they have the right to this money they have worked for it.   mps who have put this stupid idea foreward sould put the affairs of the house in order first,let them try it! not much chance of that on a gold plated pension.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
